product_name: Typhoo Green Tea, 100 Tea Bags: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: I have been drinking green tea for 8 years now and I have used a lot of brands; tea bags and loose. I personally use tea bags more cause it's really convenient, although loose green teas are considered better. Anyway, from lipton to tetley to any small brand you can possibly think of I can assure you Typhoo is the BEST. Decent price, good quality wise and very efficient. So if you want to maintain weight, lose weight or get a daily dose of antioxidants, I would recommend this.

It's bitter in taste without sugar but we cn have it with honey and lemon... For people who like green tea I will only suggest this... Good packaging and tea bags in small packets... Cn take to different places easily... It's natural and pure... Go for it
Nice Product,they must add New Samples for testing inside the pack of 100 as an promotion so customer can Know other products too.

reviews.review_title: Best drink to start your day with!!
reviews.review_body: Tasted numerous brands for best alternative to TWG moroccan mint taste because of less supply of TWG products and found typhoon very close to it. I like it's bittery taste. Will suggest to consume green-tea without suger and milk (which people often do) for best results and to improve taste buds.Surely recommend.Thanks to Amazon for fast shipment.

Great service by Amazon India. No complains there. However my issue is with typhoo itself. The tea bags have their left corner cut a bit so when we want to use, we can easily tear it off. However, this time when I ordered, the corner wasn't cut properly making it rough to open tea bag.The tea is good like any other green tea. I prefer it because you don't have to constantly dip like many other teas.

Taste was Same like Plain Green tea From Lipton but Price is Much Lesser Compared to that.Each Bag is Individually PackedAnd arranged in Nice Arrays of 25 Bags Each in that Big Box.Will Definitely Buy Again.

It's ok type of green tea.. but if you have options then I would suggest to go for better brands like Tetley, organic India etc..I had orange and levendor tea from Typhoo so I had ordered a big box of 100 bags of this, it's very very mild as if u are just having hot water.. u can't use it for the 2nd time like we can use a tea bag from other brands for two times.
Its really good... i saw changes in me... as i loose my weight... after pregnancy i gained lots of weight.... it helped me a lot as i hardly get time for exercise.
Love this tea..will be ordering more!
